name: Evolution: Link(Demo)
description:
故事简介：公元22XX年，大量人类选择完全改造肉身实现机械飞升，虽然外表没有改变，但机械的肉体与人类的意识的连接会逐渐改变人的思维方式，他们逐渐称自己为“新人类”，而一部分人拒绝与机械的连接，被称作“旧人类”，双方矛盾越来越深......你将扮演一名潜入旧人类社区的新人类，调查一系列事件背后的真相。

玩法：玩家通过点击像素地图上到不同区域寻找线索并与全国 人大对话来推动剧情。

Story introduction: in 22xx A.D., a large number of human beings chose to completely transform the physical body to realize the mechanical flight. Although the appearance has not changed, the connection between the mechanical body and human consciousness will gradually change people's way of thinking. They gradually call themselves "new humans", while some people refuse to connect with machinery and are called "old humans". The contradiction between the two sides is becoming deeper and deeper You will play a new human who sneaks into the old human community and investigate the truth behind a series of events.

How to play: players click on the pixel map to find clues in different areas and talk with the National People's Congress to promote the plot.

制作组：F.O.S studio

策划（关卡设计）：罗骐翼（Halfsummer）

剧本（脚本）：罗骐翼（Halfsummer）

美工（美术设计师）：黄铠赫（Octo)

程序（程序）：何晗晨（Han）
